description: Detailed explanation of the product, including its value proposition, features, benefits, target market, branding, visual elements, and tone of voice.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Our Privacy Policy governs your visit to https://www.typedream.com/, and
explains how we collect, safeguard and disclose information that results from
your use of our Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By using Service, you agree
to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**USAGE DATA** ​​ is data collected automatically either generated by the use
of Service or from Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of
a page visit).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information Collection and Use**

We collect several different types of information for various purposes to
provide and improve our Service to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Information You Provide to Us**

We collect information that you voluntarily provide in the following ways:

(a) Account Creation

(b) Filling in a form on our site

(c) Contacting us

(d) Purchasing a plan

(e) Inviting others to use Typedream

**Information we collect automatically when you use our Services**

(a) Log data such as errors, warnings, and usage of the service

(b) Cookies

(c) Analytics

**Information we collect from other sources**

(a) Payment Processors.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
However, we may receive limited information about your payment card from
Stripe, such as the last four digits of your card, the country of issuance,
and the expiration date.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If you choose to sign up and log in in this manner, the third-party
authentication service will ask your permission to share certain information
with us, including your name, profile picture, and email address.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Types of Data Collected**

**Personal Data**

While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally
identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you
(**“​Personal Data​​”**).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Personally identifiable information may include, but
is not limited to:

(a) Email address

(b) Phone number

We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or
promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Usage Data**

We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our
Service or when you access Service by or through a mobile device (**“​​Usage
Data​​”**).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet
Protocol address (e.g.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages
of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent
on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
When you access Service with a mobile device, this Usage Data may include
information such as the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device
unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system,
the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and
other diagnostic data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Location Data**

We may use and store information about your location if you give us permission
to do so (**“​​Location Data​​”**).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Tracking Cookies Data**

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our
Service and we hold certain information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Other tracking technologies are also used such as beacons,
tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze
our Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Please note, we may not be able to provide Service without some necessary
data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
You have the right to complain to a Data Protection Authority about our
collection and use of your Personal Data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The law’s reach stretches well
beyond California to require a person or company in the United States (and
conceivable the world) that operates websites collecting personally
identifiable information from California consumers to post a conspicuous
privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected
and those individuals with whom it is being shared, and to comply with this
policy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Google Analytics**

Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and
reports website traffic.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Google uses the data collected to track and monitor
the use of our Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Microsoft Clarity**

We partner with Microsoft Clarity and Microsoft Advertising to capture how you
use and interact with our website through behavioral metrics, heatmaps, and
session replay to improve and market our products/services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Website usage data
is captured using first and third-party cookies and other tracking
technologies to determine the popularity of products/services and online
activity.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For more information about how
Microsoft collects and uses your data, visit the [Microsoft Privacy
Statement](https://privacy.microsoft.com/privacystatement).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For more information on what data GitHub collects for what purpose and how the
protection of the data is ensured, please visit GitHub Privacy Policy page:
[https://help.github.com/en/articles/github-privacy-
statement](https://help.github.com/en/articles/github-privacy-statement)​.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For more information on what data GitLab CI/CD collects for what purpose and
how the protection of the data is ensured, please visit GitLab CI/CD Privacy
Policy page:
[https://about.gitlab.com/privacy/](https://about.gitlab.com/privacy/).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on provides
visitors with the ability to prevent their data from being collected and used
by Google Analytics.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: We will not store or collect your payment card details.

description: Narrative content of the website's homepage, guiding visitors through the site. It should effectively communicate the product's value proposition and encourage visitors to take the desired action.
data_name: Narrative content of the website's homepage
